title: Wtf is Veig
body: Tired of seeing Veig building tank with the only ap items of {{item:3040}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3089}}  haveing 1300 ap its insane he was so tanky and unkillable while still doing insane dmg that is point click when will his passive be nerfed?

replies.body: Someone let him freefarm. Dont do that.

Well he is kind of a mage Nasus. They both are imbalancingly strong if you not shutting them down early. 
I hate Nasus also. He is strong and will melt faces. But I guess they are just late game champs. Also buy mr it really helps.
